items.label: 是否自动加载模型文件

data.doc:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<descriptor id="CFX" filled="true"><options name="base.parameter" info="基本参数" id="basic" narrow="false"><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.text" required="false" label="作业名称" id="JOB_NAME" helpText="" follower="null" width="" defaultValue="" hidden="false"></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="true" label="项目名称" id="PROJECT" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"><option id="project" selected="true">project</option></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" label="核数" id="NCPU" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"><option id="1" selected="false">1</option><option id="2" selected="false">2</option><option id="4" selected="true">4</option><option id="6" selected="false">6</option><option id="8" selected="false">8</option><option id="10" selected="false">10</option><option id="12" selected="false">12</option><option id="16" selected="false">16</option><option id="16" selected="false">32</option></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" label="队列" id="QUEUE" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="normal" hidden="false"><option id="cfx" selected="true">cfx</option></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" label="是否自动加载模型文件" id="AUTO" helpText="" follower="" defaultValue="" hidden="false"><option id="Yes" selected="true">Yes</option><option id="No" selected="false">No</option></option></options><options name="application.parameter" info="应用参数" id="application" narrow="false"><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" label="版本" id="VERSION" helpText="" follower="" defaultValue="undefined" hidden="false"><option id="17.2" selected="true">17.2</option><option id="18.1" selected="false">18.1</option></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" label="图形支持" id="CONSOLE_SUPPORT" helpText="" follower="" defaultValue="" hidden="false"><option id="Yes" selected="true">Yes</option><option id="No" selected="false">No</option></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" label="是否支持交互" id="INTERACTIVE_SUPPORT" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"><option id="Yes" selected="true">Yes</option><option id="No" selected="false">No</option></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" label="插值" id="INTERPOLATE" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"><option id="Yes" selected="true">Yes</option><option id="No" selected="false">No</option></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" label="并行模式" id="RUN_MODE" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"><option id="HP MPI Local Parallel" selected="false">HP MPI Local Parallel</option><option id="HP MPI Distributed Parallel" selected="false">HP MPI Distributed Parallel</option><option id="PVM local Parallel" selected="false">PVM local Parallel</option><option id="PVM Distributed Parallel" selected="false">PVM Distributed Parallel</option><option id="MPICH Distributed Parallel" selected="false">MPICH Distributed Parallel</option><option id="MPICH Local Parallel" selected="false">MPICH Local Parallel</option><option id="Serial" selected="false">Serial</option><option id="Platform MPI Local Parallel" selected="true">Platform MPI Local Parallel</option><option id="Platform MPI Distributed Parallel" selected="false">Platform MPI Distributed Parallel</option><option id="Intel MPI Distributed Parallel" selected="false">Intel MPI Distributed Parallel</option><option id="Intel MPI Local Parallel" selected="false">Intel MPI Local Parallel</option></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.text" required="false" label="迭代次数" id="ITE_NUM" helpText="" follower="null" width="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" label="是否支持双精度" id="DOUBLE_SUPPORT" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"><option id="Yes" selected="false">Yes</option><option id="No" selected="true">No</option></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.text" required="false" label="分区内存分配因子" id="PAR_MEM_FACTOR" helpText="" follower="null" width="null" defaultValue="1.0" hidden="false"></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.text" required="false" label="求解器内存分配因子" id="SOL_MEM_FACTOR" helpText="" follower="null" width="null" defaultValue="1.0" hidden="false"></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.remotelocate.file" required="true" label="定义文件(.def)" id="DEF_INPUT_FILE" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.remotelocate.file" required="false" label="初始值文件(*.res)" id="INI_FILE" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.remotelocate.file" required="false" label="资源文件(.res)" id="RES_INPUT_FILE" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.remotelocate.file" required="false" label="其他文件" id="OTHER_INPUT_FILE" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"></option></options><options name="install.application.parameter" info="应用程序安装参数" id="mandatory" narrow="false"><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.text" required="false" label="CFX可执行程序路径" id="CFX_PATH" helpText="" follower="null" width="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"></option></options></descriptor>
